definition: executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: One should look at executive bonus with a slightly dispassionate approach.
sentences.chinese: 大家应该稍微冷静冷静，理智看待高管奖金这事。

sentences.english: Ms. Porat, 57, will be the first woman in Google's senior ranks .
sentences.chinese: 57岁的波拉特将是谷歌高管阶层的首位女性。

sentences.english: He also hob-nobbed with executives from Google and other Silicon Valley companies.
sentences.chinese: 他还和来自谷歌和其他硅谷公司的高管亲切交谈。

sentences.english: “But the last man will switch off the button,” one executive said.
sentences.chinese: “但最后一个人会关闭按钮，”一名高管表示。

sentences.english: These leaders are responsible for overseeing all employee training and succession-planning programs.
sentences.chinese: 这些高管负责监督员工培训及接班人计划的落实。

sentences.english: Supervisors of foreign-capital enterprises will converge on Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 外资企业的高管将辐辏上海。

sentences.english: Yet some executives will still walk away with large paychecks.
sentences.chinese: 不过一些高管仍将带着丰厚的报酬离开。

sentences.english: Executives from Yahoo (YHOO) on Apr. 7 reiterated the reasons for their opposition.
sentences.chinese: 4月7日，雅虎的高管再次重申他们的反对原因。

sentences.english: Alice: That's right – but how does having grey-haired executives on board help, Rob?
sentences.chinese: 没错，董事会中有年长的高管对他到底有什么帮助呢？

sentences.english: Executives from Solyndra are scheduled to testify before the subcommittee next week.
sentences.chinese: Solyndra高管将于下周在商务委员会前答辩。

sentences.english: Executives are rotated between institutions by government decree.
sentences.chinese: 执行高管通常由政府任命在不同金融机构轮调。

sentences.english: China launches probe into alleged graft at telcos.
sentences.chinese: 政府发起对电信运营商高管的反腐调查。

sentences.english: Procrastination at the top during a crisis antagonized the board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 公司高管在危机中的延宕促使董事会奋起行动。

sentences.english: Still, here we are chattin’ these three yahoos up.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这里我们仍在讨论这三位雅虎高管。

sentences.english: Greentown executives say the company remains strong.
sentences.chinese: 绿城集团的高管表示公司目前运营情况十分良好。

sentences.english: declined to make Mr. Brin or any other executives available for an interview.
sentences.chinese: 拒绝让布林或其他高管接受采访。

definition: to retire/to leave office/to quit a job
vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
